alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 04 at 9:11AM MDT until June 04 at 4:36PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Montana... Clear Creek at Chinook affecting Blaine County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Clear Creek at Chinook. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.5 feet, Machinist Road not passable. Clear Creek Road covered by water in two locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 6.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM MDT Sunday was 8.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 445 PM MDT.
